member.name: T:R2API.Models.AnimatorDiff
member.summary: An object containing a difference between 2 RuntimeAnimatorControllers.

member.name: T:R2API.Models.AnimatorLayerBlendingMode
member.summary: Specifies how the layer is blended with the previous layers.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.AnimatorLayerBlendingMode.Override
member.summary: Animations overrides to the previous layers.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.AnimatorLayerBlendingMode.Additive
member.summary: Animations are added to the previous layers.

member.name: T:R2API.Models.BlendTreeType
member.summary: The type of blending algorithm that the blend tree uses.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.BlendTreeType.Simple1D
member.summary: Basic blending using a single parameter.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.BlendTreeType.SimpleDirectional2D
member.summary: Best used when your motions represent different directions, such as "walk forward", "walk backward", "walk left", and "walk right", or "aim up", "aim down", "aim left", and "aim right".

member.name: F:R2API.Models.BlendTreeType.FreeformDirectional2D
member.summary: This blend type is used when your motions represent different directions, however you can have multiple motions in the same direction, for example "walk forward" and "run forward".

member.name: F:R2API.Models.BlendTreeType.FreeformCartesian2D
member.summary: Best used when your motions do not represent different directions.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.BlendTreeType.Direct
member.summary: Direct control of blending weight for each node.

member.name: P:R2API.Models.ChildMotion.ClipBundlePath
member.summary: Full path to an AssetBundle that contains AnimationClip for this state.

member.name: T:R2API.Models.ConditionMode
member.summary: The mode of the condition.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.ConditionMode.IsTrue
member.summary: The condition is true when the parameter value is true.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.ConditionMode.IsFalse
member.summary: The condition is true when the parameter value is false.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.ConditionMode.IsGreater
member.summary: The condition is true when parameter value is greater than the threshold.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.ConditionMode.IsLess
member.summary: The condition is true when the parameter value is less than the threshold.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.ConditionMode.IsEqual
member.summary: The condition is true when parameter value is equal to the threshold.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.ConditionMode.IsNotEqual
member.summary: The condition is true when the parameter value is not equal to the threshold.

member.name: T:R2API.Models.EntryTransition
member.summary: EntryTransitions define when and how the state machine switch from one state to another. EntryTransition always originate from a StateMachine or a StateMachine entry. They do not define timing parameters.

member.name: T:R2API.Models.InterruptionSource
member.summary: Which AnimatorState transitions can interrupt the Transition.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.InterruptionSource.None
member.summary: The Transition cannot be interrupted. Formerly know as Atomic.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.InterruptionSource.Source
member.summary: The Transition can be interrupted by transitions in the source AnimatorState.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.InterruptionSource.Destination
member.summary: The Transition can be interrupted by transitions in the destination AnimatorState.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.InterruptionSource.SourceThenDestination
member.summary: The Transition can be interrupted by transitions in the source or the destination AnimatorState.

member.name: F:R2API.Models.InterruptionSource.DestinationThenSource
member.summary: The Transition can be interrupted by transitions in the source or the destination AnimatorState.

member.summary: Blend trees are used to blend continuously animation between their children. They can either be 1D or 2D.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IBlendTree.BlendParameter
member.summary: Parameter that is used to compute the blending weight of the children in 1D blend trees or on the X axis of a 2D blend tree.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IBlendTree.BlendParameterY
member.summary: Parameter that is used to compute the blending weight of the children on the Y axis of a 2D blend tree.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IBlendTree.BlendType
member.summary: The Blending type can be either 1D or different types of 2D.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IBlendTree.Children
member.summary: A list of the blend tree child motions.

member.summary: The path to a DestinationState as all parent StateMachines separated by . i.e. "StateMachine1.StateMachine2". If left empty it's assumed that the source and destination states are in the same state machine.

member.summary: Conditions that need to be met for a transition to happen.

member.name: T:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState
member.summary: States are the basic building blocks of a state machine. Each state contains a Motion (AnimationClip or BlendTree) which will play while the character is in that state. When an event in the game triggers a state transition, the character will be left in a new state whose animation sequence will then take over.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.Name
member.summary: Name of the state.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.Tag
member.summary: A tag can be used to identify a state.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.SpeedParam
member.summary: The animator controller parameter that drives the speed value. Leave null if you want to use constant value.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.MirrorParam
member.summary: The animator controller parameter that drives the mirror value. Leave null if you want to use constant value.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.CycleOffsetParam
member.summary: The animator controller parameter that drives the cycle offset value. Leave null if you want to use constant value.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.TimeParam
member.summary: The animator controller parameter that drives the time value. Leave null if you want to use constant value.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.Speed
member.summary: The default speed of the motion.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.CycleOffset
member.summary: Offset at which the animation loop starts. Useful for synchronizing looped animations. Units is normalized time.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.IKOnFeet
member.summary: Should Foot IK be respected for this state.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.WriteDefaultValues
member.summary: Whether or not the AnimatorStates writes back the default values for properties that are not animated by its Motion.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.Loop
member.summary: AnimationClip is looped.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.Mirror
member.summary: Should the state be mirrored.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.Transitions
member.summary: The transitions that are going out of the state.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.IState.Behaviours
member.summary: The Behaviour list assigned to this state.

member.summary: The name of a state that will play on state machine entry.

member.summary: The path to a DefaultState as all parent StateMachines separated by . i.e. "StateMachine1.StateMachine2". If left empty it's assumed that the default state is in this state machine.

member.summary: The Behaviour list assigned to this state.

member.name: T:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition
member.summary: Transitions define when and how the state machine switch from one state to another. Transition always originate from an Animator State (or AnyState) and have timing parameters.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.TransitionDuration
member.summary: The duration of the transition.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.Offset
member.summary: The time at which the destination state will start.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.ExitTime
member.summary: If Transition.HasExitTime is true, ExitTime represents the exact time at which the transition can take effect. This is represented in normalized time, so for example an exit time of 0.75 means that on the first frame where 75% of the animation has played, the Exit Time condition will be true. On the next frame, the condition will be false. For looped animations, transitions with exit times smaller than 1 will be evaluated every loop, so you can use this to time your transition with the proper timing in the animation, every loop. Transitions with exit times greater than one will be evaluated only once, so they can be used to exit at a specific time, after a fixed number of loops. For example, a transition with an exit time of 3.5 will be evaluated once, after three and a half loops.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.HasExitTime
member.summary: When active the transition will have an exit time condition.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.HasFixedDuration
member.summary: Determines whether the duration of the transition is reported in a fixed duration in seconds or as a normalized time.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.InterruptionSource
member.summary: Which AnimatorState transitions can interrupt the Transition.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.OrderedInterruption
member.summary: The Transition can be interrupted by a transition that has a higher priority.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.CanTransitionToSelf
member.summary: Set to true to allow or disallow transition to self during AnyState transition.

member.name: P:R2API.Animations.Models.Interfaces.ITransition.IsExit
member.summary: Is the transition destination the exit of the current state machine.

member.name: T:R2API.AutoVersionGen.AutoVersionAttribute
member.summary: Add a PluginVersion field to the attribut-ed class filled from the thunderstore.toml versionNumber field
